import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-footer', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './footer.component.html', styleUrls: ['./footer.component.css'] }) export class FooterComponent { constructor(private router: Router) {} navigateToSection(section: string): void { this.router.navigate([section]); } }
